natural solution: Notice that $501^2 - 499^2$ can also be expressed as $(501+499)(501-499)$. This is the same as $1000 \cdot 2$, so our answer is $\boxed{2000}$.

fixes a b :: real
assumes h0 : "a = 501"
and h1 : "b = 499"
shows  "a powr 2 - b powr 2 = 2000"

 ### Proof
 Notice that $501^2 - 499^2$ can also be expressed as $(501+499)(501-499)$. This is the same as $1000 \cdot 2$, so our answer is $\boxed{2000}$.
 *)

theorem
fixes a b :: real
assumes h0 : "a = 501"
and h1 : "b = 499"
shows  "a powr 2 - b powr 2 = 2000"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
